titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a lytell treatyse called the Lucydarye
Elucidarius
titleStmt.author: Honorius, of Autun, ca. 1080-ca. 1156.
Chertsey, Andrew.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Translated by Andrew Chertsey from a French version of the Lucidarius. Leaf E8 verso has de Worde's device, McKerrow 20--STC.
Identifed as STC 3686 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
